column1: 03:12|A table with anglers' magazines and an ashtray
column2: a few books on a shelf
column5: a mantel clocked stopped at twelve minutes past three.|In the Company of Others|Jan Karon

column2:
and Charlie was calling.
She answered
column3:
""Are you still sitting outside that hotel?""
""Yeah. This is bullshit. I'm going in to get this guy
column4: and I don't care what he's in the middle of doing."" "|Vatican Shadows|Ray Keating
